competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: Dominant CPU competitor (Goliath to AMD's David). Released Skylake architecture. Intel i5 considered much stronger than AMD FX-8350 for gaming

competitors.name: NVIDIA
competitors.notes: Primary GPU competitor. Released 4 new GPUs in 2015. Key products: GTX 750 Ti, GTX 950, GTX 960, GTX 970, GTX 980, GTX 980 Ti (great success, ultra high-end performance at accessible price)

context: In 2015, AMD was the David to Intel's Goliath, a challenger seeking to disrupt Intel's CPU dominance. AMD's FX series known for raw computing power and overclocking. A-Series APUs combined CPU and GPU capabilities. In GPU market, NVIDIA released 4 new GPUs while AMD delivered 8 cards (only 3 truly new: R9 Fury X, Fury, Nano). AMD pioneered High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) with Fiji architecture.
